result.title: PIXEL data acquisition, information hub and data representation v2
result.description: This deliverable will be the main asset of software documentation of the project including data sources collecting mechanisms technologies protocols the operational analytics engine and tools and the visualization and notification module First release will include the report about software mechanisms for data acquisition and description of the performance of a service in the port area Furthermore the first release is expected to include a technological state of art a short description of the technology developed and the software itself Second version the design of integrated information system the theoretical representation of data and the requirements will be described Generically first version will contain software prototypes while the second will provide the final products Associated task T64 T65 and T66
